title: Saisrijith Reddy — AI • ML • Data Science Project Portfolio
text:
Below is a curated lineup of my most impactful AI, ML, and data science projects. Each link takes you directly to the project’s GitHub repository or article.



GitHub: https://github.com/srijith-reddy/M.I.R.A(Private Build)
Medium Article: https://medium.com/@shrey.maramreddy/building-mira-my-voice-activated-multimodal-ai-assistant-from-scratch-604448979a1a
A fully modular, voice-activated AI assistant with many autonomous agents (BrowserAgent, PlannerAgent, GmailAgent, CalendarAgent, WhatsAppAgent, MusicAgent).
Includes wake-word detection, GPT-4o vision fusion, trust-ranked browsing, async orchestration, and multimodal reasoning.




Website link: https://srijith-reddy.github.io/Statistical-Learning-for-Data-Mining-Projects/
Developed as a summer research project, this full-stack workflow builds and evaluates equity alpha factors across multiple time horizons. Integrated OHLCV, options, and macroeconomic data, and applied SHAP- and IC-based feature pruning, ElasticNet ensembles, and Optuna-tuned XGBoost/LightGBM models to forecast 1D/5D/21D forward returns. The pipeline was later extended with HMM-based regime detection and CVXPY portfolio optimization, achieving robust out-of-sample IC and Sharpe improvements.




Website link: https://srijith-reddy.github.io/Statistical-Learning-for-Data-Mining-Projects/
600k+ record real-estate dataset.
Feature engineering + binning + XGBoost/LightGBM tuned with Optuna.




GitHub: https://github.com/srijith-reddy/Elo-Based-Time-Series-Forecasting
ATP tennis forecasting dashboard using ARIMA auto-selection + surface-aware Elo system.
Forecasts 6–24 month player form and win probabilities.




Website link: https://srijith-reddy.github.io/Statistical-Learning-for-Data-Mining-Projects/
Fairness-aware classification using Naive Bayes, LDA, SVM, Ridge/Lasso Logistic Regression with CVX fairness constraints.
Reduces TPR gaps across school tiers.




Website link: https://srijith-reddy.github.io/Statistical-Learning-for-Data-Mining-Projects/
Simulated the performance of Ridge Regression vs OLS under both linear and nonlinear data-generating processes.
Demonstrated the full bias–variance decomposition with clear visualizations showing when and why Ridge outperforms OLS, especially under high noise or multicollinearity.




GitHub: https://github.com/srijith-reddy/Global-Safety-Regression-Model
Analyzing how GDP, internet access, population growth, refugees, and development metrics relate to homicide rates across 169 countries.




GitHub: https://github.com/srijith-reddy/Multivariate-Stat-Methods
Multivariate regression, MANOVA, PCA, and CCA on physical measurements to estimate body fat % and BMI.




GitHub: https://github.com/srijith-reddy/msft-pinterest-valuation-analysis
Full DCF, comps, and precedent analysis determining an implied acquisition price of $26.87/share.
Includes 30-page report + pitch deck.
